home.title: Embark on a coding journey with me!
home.description: Discover exciting articles covering a variety of programming topics, providing valuable insights from fundamentals to advanced concepts.

terminal.title: Whoami
terminal.line2: Programming is my passion, I don't limit myself to one language.

stack.title: Tech Stack
stack.devops: I have a solid knowledge of containerization and Kubernetes from a developer's perspective, supported by a CKAD certificate validating my practical expertise.
stack.backend: Focused on backend development, I bring extensive experience as a Java and Scala developer, designing and implementing robust solutions. My proficiency reflects a commitment to delivering high-quality software.
stack.frontend: I have robust technical skills in front-end technologies. Proficient in creating visually appealing interfaces, my expertise provides an excellent user experience with a solid foundation in design principles and functionality.
